name: Chad R Cahill
body:
### Summary
Driven with a passion for technology that strives to consistently improve the organization and grow as an individual. Demonstrates leadership and operates with high attention to detail while consistently delivering value to the company by tackling complex problems. Ready to take on challenges and learn new technologies as the fast paced technology industry continues to evolve.

### Professional Experience
#### [Hewlett Packard Enterprise](https://www.hpe.com)
Hewlett Packard has been innovating for over 75 years. Today, Hewlett Packard Enterprise leverages its experience to help organizations transition from traditional platforms to the IT systems of the future. 
#### Database Engineer / Developer | June 2014 - Present
Develop software to automate processes and improve efficiency. Provide database specific consulting and assistance to application teams during the software development life cycle. Prepare databases for production with maintenance jobs, monitoring and backups. Resolve critical escalations by quickly troubleshooting and relieving issues involving poor performance, data loss and user accessibility.

### Technical Skills
* SQL Server, MariaDB, MySQL
* C#, Git, TSQL, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, jQuery, VisualStudio
* ASP.NET MVC framework

### Education
California State University, Chico
B.S. Computer Engineering | May 2014

### Training
SQL Server Hands on Training | September 2016

### [Resume](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B8h_SRhAEKHZZUZIMU5mLXlURG8) | [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/chadcahill)

### Contact
(201) 897-2423

chad.cahill@gmail.com
